text: You think darkness is your ally?
I won't bury you. I've buried enough members of the Wayne family.
Sometimes the truth isn't good enough.
Why do you wear the mask?
When Gotham is ashes, you have my permission to die.
I was wondering what would break first. Your spirit, or your body.
Oh, you think darkness is your ally? But you merely adopted the dark; I was born in it, molded by it.
Calm down, Doctor. Now is not the time for fear. That comes later.
Speak of the devil, and he shall appear.
We will destroy Gotham and then, when it is done and Gotham is ashes, then you have my permission to die.
Nobody cared who I was until I put on the mask.
